class.name: Callable
class.brief_description: An object representing a method in a certain object that can be called.

constructor.name: Callable
constructor.description: Constructs a null [Callable] with no object nor method bound.

constructor.name: Callable
constructor.description: Constructs a [Callable] as a copy of the given [Callable].

constructor.name: Callable
constructor.description: Creates a new [Callable] for the method called [code]method[/code] in the specified [code]object[/code].

method.name: bind
method.description: Returns a copy of this [Callable] with the arguments bound. Bound arguments are passed after the arguments supplied by [method call].

method.name: call
method.description: Calls the method represented by this [Callable]. Arguments can be passed and should match the method's signature.

method.name: call_deferred
method.description: Calls the method represented by this [Callable] in deferred mode, i.e. during the idle frame. Arguments can be passed and should match the method's signature.

method.name: get_method
method.description: Returns the name of the method represented by this [Callable].

method.name: get_object
method.description: Returns the object on which this [Callable] is called.

method.name: get_object_id
method.description: Returns the ID of this [Callable]'s object (see [method Object.get_instance_id]).

method.name: hash
method.description: Returns the hash value of this [Callable]'s object.

method.name: is_custom
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Callable] is a custom callable whose behavior differs based on implementation details. Custom callables are used in the engine for various reasons. If [code]true[/code], you can't use [method get_method].

method.name: is_null
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Callable] has no target to call the method on.

method.name: is_standard
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Callable] is a standard callable, referencing an object and a method using a [StringName].

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the object exists and has a valid function assigned, or is a custom callable.

method.name: rpc
method.description: Perform an RPC (Remote Procedure Call). This is used for multiplayer and is normally not available unless the function being called has been marked as [i]RPC[/i]. Calling it on unsupported functions will result in an error.

method.name: rpc_id
method.description: Perform an RPC (Remote Procedure Call) on a specific peer ID (see multiplayer documentation for reference). This is used for multiplayer and is normally not available unless the function being called has been marked as [i]RPC[/i]. Calling it on unsupported functions will result in an error.

method.name: unbind
method.description: Returns a copy of this [Callable] with the arguments unbound. Calling the returned [Callable] will call the method without the extra arguments that are supplied in the [Callable] on which you are calling this method.

operator.name: operator !=
operator.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if both [Callable]s invoke different targets.

operator.name: operator ==
operator.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if both [Callable]s invoke the same custom target.
